sourcesContent: import { React } from "react"; import "./Pay.css"; import { FaDollarSign } from "react-icons/fa"; import { Input ,InputGroup ,InputLeftElement , InputRightElement , CheckIcon} from '@chakra-ui/react' import { Modal, ModalOverlay, ModalContent, ModalHeader, ModalFooter, ModalBody, ModalCloseButton, Button, useDisclosure, IconButton, Text, Image, } from "@chakra-ui/react"; const Pay = ({ user, children }) => { const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure(); return ( <> {children ? ( {children} ) : ( } onClick={onOpen} colorScheme="grey" _hover={{ bg: "rgb(2, 163, 34);" }} bg="rgb(114,137,218)" borderRadius="50%" marginLeft="8px" /> )} {"Payment"} } /> ); }; export default Pay;
